name: WP Share Simple
author: Vamsi Mannem

sections.description:
Wp Simple Share will display facebook and twitter buttons along with social shared count on singular posts:

  • Posts.

After you install, goto wordpress admin panel -> Settings -> Wp Share Simple

-> Choose the display option

-> Enter Hex color code for share count

-> Save Settings
sections.installation:
The easiest way to install wp share simple is :

Go to your website admin screen plugins page

Click on Add New

Search for ‘Wp Share Simple’ and install

Manual Installation

1. Upload the `wp-share-simple` folder to the `/wp-content/plugins/` directory

2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Where is the options page ?

Go to Settings >> Wp Share Simple

How to Activate the plugin ?

Go to Settings >> Wp Share Simple >> Check the option Active Simple Share Buttons and Save
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Released initial version of wp share simple.

1.1

  • Updated Minor Fixes

1.2

  • Created new button style
  • By Default plugin is inactive
  • Users can activate and deactivate the plugin
  • Added option to choose new button styles

1.3

  • Added Manual option to render shortcode

1.4

  • Added Option to change the button text

short_description: Simple sharing plugin to display social shared count from facebook and twitter
description:
Wp Simple Share will display facebook and twitter buttons along with social shared count on singular posts:

After you install, goto wordpress admin panel -> Settings -> Wp Share Simple

-> Choose the display option
